high_descs: Turn right and go to the desk
Close the laptop and pick it up from the desk
Turn left and go to the lamp on the desk
anns.task_desc: Pick up a laptop and turn on a lamp

high_descs: Turn around and go to the table with a laptop
Close the laptop and pick it up from the table
Go to the end of the table by the wall
Turn on the lamp that is on far left end of the table
anns.task_desc: Pick up the laptop and turn on the lamp

high_descs: Look down and turn right towards the trash can  then turn right towards the desk
close the lap top and pick it up from the desk
go left then right towards the desk again
anns.task_desc: pick up the lap top from the desk and turn on the lamp
